name: Spiritual Warfare & Wisdom Tree Collection
description: Spiritual Warfare is a Zelda-like overhead action game where you play as a soldier of God, fighting the forces of darkness in various parts of a modern city to find the armor of God, each one guarded by increasingly difficult demon bosses. The game includes other 3 Popular Wisdom Tree games: Bible Adventures, Joshua, and Exodus!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 100 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
